p.k: Life Story Italy, Usa (1950). Hrají: Ingrid Bergman, Mario Vitale, Renzo Cesana. Režie: Roberto Rossellini.
p.d: Karen, a young woman from the Baltic countries, marries fisherman Antonio to escape from a prisoners camp. But the life in Antonio's village, Stromboli, threatened by the volcano, is a tough one and Karen cannot get used to it.
